input.sentences: these were some pictures i took during a breast cancer marathon that was held .
the people running seemed very motivated .
the marathon was held for a long period of time
even people dressed as robots showed up !
output.sentences: There were many pictures taken of the marathon that was held by the charity organization.
There were many motivated running people at it.
At this period of the race who will have the best time?
For humor there were a few people dressed as robots in the race.
The winner was excited to finish in first place.
